allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Peptide SaaS Platform

Backend \(FastAPI\):
- Supplier rankings API with Janoshik scoring algorithm
- Peptide calculator endpoints
- User favorites management
- Supabase JWT authentication
- Async PostgreSQL with SQLAlchemy
- Background scraper worker
- Alembic migrations

Frontend \(React + TypeScript\):
- Rankings dashboard with table/grid views
- Supplier detail pages with certificates
- Dose calculator with multiple modes
- User authentication flow
- TailwindCSS styling

Infrastructure:
- Docker configuration
- docker-compose for local development
- Deployment ready for Railway + Vercel

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
